body.name: ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter NVMe M.2 SSD to PCIe X4/X8/X16 Card with Aluminum Heat Sink M.2 to PCI-Express SSD Expansion Card Support 2230 2242 2260 2280 Compatible for Windows/Linux/Moc os
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 19 mins
FREE pickup Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: 【PCIE to M.2 adapter】Compatible with 2230/2242/2260/2280 M.2 PCIE (NVMe) M-Key/B&M key SSDs. *Note: M.2 NGFF (SATA) is not supported; PCI-e protocol SSDs with NVME specification must be readable in WIN10. To boot as a system disk, the motherboard BIOS must support PCI-e booting.
【Support List】Expansion card support: PCIe 4X / 8X / 16X, M-Key/B&M-key PCIE to M.2 adapter. *Note: PCI-E 1x and PCI slots are not supported; MSATA and B-KEY interfaces are not supported.

【High-speed Transfer】The adapter uses the NVMe protocol and PCI-E lanes, the maximum read speed reaches 32 Gbp/s (theoretical speed). This greatly reduces the transfer time for large files. *Note: The actual transfer speed depends on the device interface and working environment.

【Safe and Stable】Solid-state capacitors are used for voltage regulation, which prevents current waves from being generated in the event of SSD damage. It can operate stably under high and low temperature conditions to protect the hard disk. PCIE to M.2 adapter size: 140*35mm (L*W), compatible with Windows 7/10/11 system, no driver is needed for win8 and above system, driver is needed for SSD in win7 and below system.

【Effective Heat Dissipation】Aluminum heatsink design reduces the temperature generated by the SSD during operation, thus stabilizing the performance of the SSD. This not only stabilizes the performance of the SSD, but also extends the life of the drive.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: M.2 NVME/NGFF Enclosure with 2 Cable M.2 NVME/NGFF Enclosure 10Gbps M.2 SATA to USB M.2 NVME/SATA to USB Adapter 2.5 Inch USB C SSD Enclosure Compatibility M.2 SATA B Key & (B+M) Key 2280/2260/2242 SSD M.2 SATA B Key & (B+M) Key 2280/2260/2242 SSD M.2 SATA B Key & (B+M) Key 2280/2260/2242 SSD M.2 SATA B Key & (B+M) Key 2280/2260/2242 SSD 2.5 inch SSD/HDD USB Interface USB 3.1 Gen 2 USB 3.1 Gen 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 USB 3.1 Gen 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 Transmission Speed 10Gbps / 6Gbps 10Gbps / 6Gbps 6Gbps 10Gbps / 6Gbps 5Gbps Material Aluminum Aluminum PCB PCB PC+ABS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter is a game-changer for anyone seeking to elevate their storage performance. This sleek and efficient adapter allows users to harness the full potential of NVMe SSDs, particularly those that support PCIe 4.0, delivering unprecedented data transfer speeds and enhancing overall system responsiveness.Installation and Compatibility (5/5):Setting up the ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter is a breeze. The package includes clear instructions, and the adapter itself is well-built with a solid construction. It supports both M.2 NVMe and PCIe 4.0 standards, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of storage devices and motherboards. The inclusion of a low-profile bracket adds to its versatility, accommodating various system configurations.Performance (5/5):The standout feature of this adapter is undoubtedly its PCIe 4.0 support. When paired with a compatible NVMe SSD, the data transfer speeds are nothing short of impressive. Users can experience lightning-fast read and write speeds, significantly reducing file transfer times and enhancing the overall performance of their systems. The ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter truly unleashes the full potential of high-speed storage devices.Build Quality and Design (4.5/5):The adapter boasts a sturdy build with a heat sink to dissipate heat effectively, ensuring optimal performance under heavy workloads. The design is compact and low-profile, allowing for easy installation even in tight spaces. However, a slight improvement in the heat sink design could further enhance its cooling efficiency.Compatibility and Versatility (5/5):One of the strengths of the ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter is its compatibility with a variety of NVMe SSDs and motherboards. Whether you are upgrading an existing system or building a new one, this adapter offers the flexibility to integrate high-speed storage seamlessly. It supports different lengths of M.2 drives, providing users with a broad range of storage options.Conclusion:The ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter is a stellar choice for users looking to unlock the full potential of their NVMe SSDs. With easy installation, outstanding performance, and broad compatibility, this adapter stands out as a reliable and high-performing solution. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or power user, the ELUTENG NVMe PCIe 4.0 Adapter is a worthwhile investment to elevate your storage experience to the next level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for M key M.2
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a tool rather than an add on device. My M.2 drives are always full, so I drop new drives in this to format, migrate, and recover data.This fits "M - key" only. It fits drives that normally fit in your motherboard M.2 slots. Ex: samsung 970 evo, crucicial T700, etc. These are for x4 bus lanesif you are using M.2 cards that run sata protocal and not nvme protocal, this adapter will not work(using b+M key or b key)The item itself:Good quality, fit slot well and locked in without to much or to little resistance.Came w a heat sink and thermal pads (didn't use since not perminant install) but looked like they would do the job just fine.It's thinner than most (doesn't pertrude too far from mobo so doesn't need mounting brackets and saves space in the tool kit.It's passive, so your pc only sees the drive you connect and doesnt need additional drivers (perfect)Would I use it for an every day adapter, yeah, it seems pretty stout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted an adapter to use NVME over PCIE when upgrading internal M.2 storage drives. I could use USB 3 adapter, but this is faster. It works great, and I like the fact that I don't need to remove a case knockout to use it. Might get another to add an extra storage drive to my computer rathern than having extra cables running all over.Also thinking about using one to get NVME drive into an older pre M.2 computer. With a thumb drive and some bootloader trickery I might be able to breathe some life into an older system. Be fun to try anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Decepcionado y confundido con el diseño de este aparato
reviews.reviewText: 1-) -Cuando se coloca el disco M.2 hay demasiada distancia entre el disipador y las láminas adhesivas disipadoras,se despegan, y pierden el contacto con la superficie2-) Coloqué el disco duro, y cuando trate de colocar el disipador, el disco se dobla demasiado, no entiendo el diseño de este aparato,en un principio pensé que estaba haciendo algo incorrecto, revise con detenimiento las instrucciones, y el armado con el disco duro,lo estaba haciendo de forma correcta, insisto el disco se dobla DEMACIADO, tuve que quitar esa pieza redonda, ya que ella provoca queeste elevado y se doble, aún quitándola, siempre queda con una curva por la presión ) vean la referencia con la línea roja de la foto3-) Esta pieza decidí no ponerla, porque al ajustar los tornillos de cada extremoEl disco se dobla DEMACIADO, pensé que llegaría a quebrarse

reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical as I only saw one review, but I bought anyway. It works well and comes with 3 heatsink pads screw and thumb nut. No problem in my older pc either.
